events.name: Social Coding
events.description: A space for women coders to learn from each other, to practice and discuss learnings with fellow peers. This would be a weekly event of informal space to do coding. So bring your pet projects along or join one of our existing teams/ projects to work on. Featured Projects:https://trello.com/b/kl2BTwil/wwc-sg-social-coding-projects Newbies Step-by-step Guide Please bring your own laptop. Agenda:6:45p - Introduce projects from members6:55p - Break out into groups7:00p - Start coding! ^_^8:30p - End session There is no food provided, so please make preparations to grab a bite before you turn up. Also, we recommend to bring your own water bottle along. Psst, this event is intended for ladies only. Host:
events.location: #03-04, IDA Labs@NDC 111 Middle Road, National Design Centre, Singapore 188969., IDA Labs@NDC 111 Middle Road, National Design Centre

events.name: Papers We Love #026
events.description:
Paper #1:  Propositions as Types : http://homepages.inf.ed.ac.uk/wadler/papers/propositions-as-types/propositions-as-types.pdf - Jingwen Chen

Paper #2: Row Hammer: Flipping Bits in Memory Without Accessing Them: An Experimental Study of DRAM Disturbance Errors : https://users.ece.cmu.edu/~yoonguk/papers/kim-isca14.pdf - Vishnu Prem

-------------------

What was the last paper within the realm of computing/technology you read and loved?

What did it inspire you to build or tinker with? 

Come share the ideas in an awesome academic/research paper with fellow engineers, programmers, and paper-readers. 

Lead a session and show off code that you wrote that implements these ideas or just give us the lowdown about the paper (because of HARD MATH!). Otherwise, just come, listen, and discuss.

-----------------

Original Meetup : http://www.meetup.com/papers-we-love
Papers Repo : https://github.com/papers-we-love/papers-we-love
Code of Conduct : https://github.com/papers-we-love/papers-we-love/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
events.location: HackerspaceSG, 344B King George's Avenue, King George's Building, Singapore 208576
